form:
This template is used to create a Model Context Protocol (MCP) ArithmeticTools Example API project.
Upon creation, the project will have a single example ArithmeticTools service interface.p>
The MCP ArithmeticTools Example Impl Server project template can then be used to create
an implementation of the ArithmeticTools remote service. The package name given when creating this project
will be required when creating the Example Impl Server and the Example MCP Server projects<//p>
